casename: Tokuhon (Private) Limited v Seow Kang Hong and Others
counsel: K Shanmugam SC (Martin & Partners) for the plaintiffs; R E Martin (Martin & Partners) for the plaintiffs; Indranee Rajah SC (Wong M Seow & JYP Chia) for the defendants; Teh Ee-Von (Wong M Seow & JYP Chia) for the defendants
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Stay of proceedings/Stay of execution pending appeal/Whether successful party entitled to costs of trial or whether payment of costs to be stayed together with other forms of execution pending appeal
